last_episode_to_air.name: Truth
last_episode_to_air.overview: A man us transformed from a fresh-faced youth following some dramatic experiences.

name: Olympus
overview: The story of how a few brave men and women banished the Gods to the realm of the unconscious - a place they called the Underworld or the Kingdom of Hades. The series follows the protagonist as he seeks the truth about his past, which may be intertwined with the Gods themselves.

episodes.name: The Temple of Gaia
episodes.overview: Hero embarks on a daring journey to rescue the Oracle of Gaia from the cave of the Cyclops and then bring her safely to the temple so that she can answer the riddle of his life in the series premiere of this mythological drama set in Ancient Greece in a world where humans, gods and monsters interact.

episodes.name: Daedalus
episodes.overview: Oracle, Hero and the genius inventor Daedalus form an unlikely alliance to find the Ring of the Magi, which is Hero's birthright.

episodes.name: Ring of the Magi
episodes.overview: Hero, Oracle and Daedalus narrowly escape capture by warrior priests while searching for the Ring of Magi; and Medea walks into a dangerous trap.

episodes.name: Minos
episodes.overview: Hero, Oracle and Daedalus are kidnapped by ruthless Minoans and brought before King Minos and his sadistic daughter Ariadne, who subjects the trio to vicious torture. Meanwhile, the situation in Athens grows more dire, compelling Medea to arrange for a mercenary to pull off a rescue mission.

episodes.name: Blood Brothers
episodes.overview: Hero makes his way to Athens to confront King Aegeus, only to be arrested and turned over to Prince Lykos, who has discovered Hero's identity and is out for blood. Back at the Minoan camp, Daedalus unveils his plans for the ultimate war machine.

episodes.name: The Lexicon
episodes.overview: Medea and Aegeus work to persuade Hero to solve the riddle of the Lexicon in hopes that he'll use his power to save Athens. However, Hero's skeptical of their true intentions and unsure of the course of action he should take.

episodes.name: Love and Time
episodes.overview: Hero and Medea travel to the Temple of Aphrodite where he receives a grim prophecy. Medea's warrior sister arrives to reclaim her sacred ring.

episodes.name: Danger and Desire
episodes.overview: King Minos invades Athens and only being given the Lexicon will halt his onslaught. Hero devises a bold plan that could put him on the road to Olympus, or to ruin.

episodes.name: Pandora's Tomb
episodes.overview: As they make their way to Olympus, Hero and Princess Ariadne begin to develop feelings for one another. Lykos and Aegeus must hide their identities in the Athens prison caves.

episodes.name: Heritage
episodes.overview: Oracle discovers the truth about the Lexicon. Hero begins to fulfill his destiny. Pandora's Tomb is opened and Hero and Medea must rush back to the palace's safety.

episodes.name: The Speed of Time
episodes.overview: Medea ends up trading her body and soul to Circe. Hermes and deadly Fates manage to sidetrack Hero and his friends.

episodes.name: Door to Olympus
episodes.overview: Medea decides to trade her body and soul to Circe. Hermes and Fates manage to sidetrack Hero and his friends.

episodes.name: Truth
episodes.overview: A man us transformed from a fresh-faced youth following some dramatic experiences.
